TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPphManager

summary.span: 提供接聽程式通道的停止和開始控制項。

span.span: Provides stop and start control of listener channels.

summary.span: 啟動指定的處理序通訊協定接聽程式通道。

span.span: Starts the specified process protocol listener channel.

param.name: protocolId

span.span: to notify the process protocol manager to stop all listener channels synchronously; to stop all listener channels asynchronously.
